metaDescription: Customize your training preferences and goals
ninetyDays: Your audio and transcripts will be retained and viewable in the training history for 90 days.
zeroDays: Your audio and transcripts will not be saved.
exportDataConfirmDesc: This will download a ZIP file containing all your personal data including sessions, feedback, and settings.
saveSettingsSuccess: Your settings have been saved successfully.
saveSettingsError: There was an error saving your settings. Please try again later.
exportSuccess: Your data has been exported successfully.
exportError: There was an error exporting your data. Please try again later.
